title: Clinical perineural invasion of cutaneous head and neck cancer: Impact of radiotherapy, imaging, and nerve growth factor receptors on symptom control and prognosis.

tldr.text: Patients with CPNI of cutaneous head and neck cancer may benefit from aggressive RT for local control and symptom improvement, and positive TrkA and/or CD271 staining predicts worse outcomes.
